turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to place an order from Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store are you looking to place an order to.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Peet's Coffee in Seal Beach, specifically on 12203 Seal Beach Blvd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Peet's Coffee location in Seal Beach, got it. What would you like to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Iced Coffee Mocha, with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like your Iced Coffee in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a small please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A small Iced Coffee Mocha, anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also can I get a small Golden Caffe Latte, with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, will that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, can I also get medium carmel macchiato, with 2% milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A medium carmel macchiato with 2% milk has been added your order, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the Iced Coffee Mocha, can you tell me how many calories and sugar it has with whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A small iced coffee mocha with whole milk has about 135 calories, and 16 grams of sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me how much it would have with soy milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: An iced coffee mocha with soy milk will instead have 90 calories and 13 grams of sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thank you, then can I switch the order from whole milk to soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your small iced coffee will be made with soy milk, anything to else to change in your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all, can you please repeat back my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order includes a small Iced Coffee Mocha with soy milk, a medium carmel macchiato with 2% milk, and a small golden caffe latte with cocunut milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That all is correct, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed, it will be ready for pickup at the store, and a receipt will be texted to you shortly.
